Filtering 1 MRI Bias Field Correction
Correction of the MRI Bias Field generated during a MRI.
ITK filter initially developed and implemented by Martin STYNER in [3]. To estimate the bias field, he uses Legendre polynomials. The 1+1 evolutionary optimizer searches for the best parameters of a Legendre polynomial (bias field estimate) which minimizes the total energy value of each image.
Load the volume you want to process in Slicer: File->Add Volume Load the MRI Bias Field Correction Filter Module: Modules->Filtering->MRI Bias Field Correction Filter Enter the mean value of the 2 tissues which are the most present in the volume. Check if you want to use or not a mask for the correction (recommended) Set the volume you loaded as “Input Volume” Choose an output volume Click on apply
